sentences.english: Influence of loading path on axial strength of circular tubular TX-joints.
sentences.chinese: 荷载路径对TX型圆管节点轴向承载力的影响。

sentences.english: Incremental encoders without bearings for drives with large axial play or high speeds.
sentences.chinese: 无轴承的驱动器增量式编码器与大型轴向或高速行驶。

sentences.english: The radial-axial large ring rolling technology was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 研究了大型环件的径轴向轧制工艺。

sentences.english: The special features and applications of warp-knitted biaxial and multiaxial reinforcement sturctures are described .
sentences.chinese: 描述了双轴向和多轴向加固经编织物特点和应用。

sentences.english: Magneto bearings transmit axial forces in only one direction.
sentences.chinese: 磁轴承只传递一个方向的轴向力。

sentences.english: High contact angles carry high axial loads.
sentences.chinese: 高接触角带有相当的轴向载荷。

sentences.english: This paper presents a strict analysis of the axial conformal slot-array on a metallic cylindrically-tipped wedge.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一种严格分析圆楔体轴向共形缝隙阵的方法。

sentences.english: A single-row Tapered roller bearing can support a combined radial and axial load.
sentences.chinese: 阿单排圆锥滚子轴承可以支持合并径向和轴向负荷。

sentences.english: Objective To determine axis tension for rat carotid segment.
sentences.chinese: 目的测定大鼠颈动脉血管段的轴向张力。

sentences.english: The depth of cut is significant factors to influence surface residual stress.
sentences.chinese: 轴向残余应力为压应力，其主要影响因素是进给量。

sentences.english: Multifunctional reactor with different axial furnace temperature can be designed and manufactured by our company.
sentences.chinese: 可以设计制作不同轴向炉内温度的多功能反应器。

sentences.english: They are optical-mechanical method, displacement detecting method and direct adjustment method.
sentences.chinese: 轴向位移检测法和直接调整法。

sentences.english: A mathematical model of axisymmetric compression of semi-solid alloy slurry was described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了一种轴向挤压的半固态合金浆料的数学模型。

sentences.english: At the vortex center zone, the tangential velocity was less than the axial velocity.
sentences.chinese: 涡心附近的切向速度小于轴向速度。

sentences.english: Afterwards the pipes will have to be secured against axial displacement by means of a clamping device.
sentences.chinese: 然后管材必需通过夹紧装置成轴向的转移。

sentences.english: This paper mainly introduces the structure and performance of a seawater hydraulic axial piston pump.
sentences.chinese: 主要介绍轴向柱塞式海水泵的结构特点及其性能。
